text:
Fatal accident closed I-70 in both directions Thursday morning

A fatal accident closed a portion of Interstate 70 in both directions Thursday morning in Frederick, according to state police. Maryland State Police said troopers were called to a two-vehicle collision in the area of eastbound I-70 at mile marker 60 in New Market. Rroopers found that the vehicles involved included a tanker truck and a passenger car. The car was fully engulfed in flames and a person was found dead inside. An adult man who was...

text:
Sea urchin explosion off California, Oregon decimates kelp

text:
Texas State Parks are offering free admission November 10 in honor of Veterans Day

Looking for weekend plans? Why not explore the beauty of Texas at a State Park?! On Sunday, November 10, Texas State Parks are waiving daily entrance fees for all visitors in honor of both active and retired military. Parks will be hosting guided hikes, bird walks, and other programs. "It is a small gesture to say thanks to those who have served in the military and their families. We invite all Texans to connect with the outdoors and make state...
